metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8169 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
curl 7.62.0 through 7.70.0 is vulnerable to an information disclosure vulnerability that can lead to a partial password being leaked over the network and to the DNS server(s).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl4 - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Marek Szlagor, Gregory Jefferis and Jeroen Ooms

criterions.comment: curl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.68.0-1ubuntu2.1').
